column4: on ubuntu server 9.10 i hv changed my ip with ifconfig command....now am able to recieve and send packets...but now when i use apt-get install ubuntu-desktop it says no package found
Check your /etc/apt/sources.lst. Why are you installing ubuntu-desktop on a server though?
You may also just need to "sudo apt-get update"
Are you sure the network is configured properly? Can you ping google.com?
